author: wn.com
title: New ‘find a barrister’ website could help public save money (Bar Council)
text: ( Source : Bar Council ) 20 October 2015 Consumers , the public and businesses can now save money by going directly to a barrister instead of having to go through a solicitor when they need a lawyer, thanks to a new website. The Bar Council's
